components.description:
A person with blond hair. This emoji maintains blond hair no matter which skin tone is chosen. This emoji may be used to talk about blonds in a gender-inclusive way.

Previously displayed as a man with blond hair on all platforms, though shown as a woman with blond hair in earliest Google, Microsoft, and Samsung designs.

Variants include üë±‍‚ôÄÔ∏è Woman with Blond Hair and üë±‍‚ôÇÔ∏è Man with Blond Hair.
components.title: Person with Blond Hair

components.description:
Zero Width Joiner (ZWJ) is a Unicode character that joins two or more other characters together in sequence to create a new emoji.

Zero Width Joiner, pronounced "zwidge", is not an emoji and has no appearance by itself. This is an invisible character when used alone.

View Emoji ZWJ Sequences that use this character.
components.title: Zero Width Joiner

components.description: A circle shown with a crossed vertical line beneath it, used as a representation for women. Often used on International Women's Day.
components.title: Female Sign

description: The female version of üë± Person with Blond Hair.

emoji_net_data.name: blond-haired woman

bn:00098578a: Being or having light colored skin and hair and usually blue or grey eyes

bn:00001530n: A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)

bn:00011342n: A light and yellowish, brownish or golden hair color.
A person with dark blond hair.
A person with fair skin and hair
Blond or blonde, or fair hair, is a hair color characterized by low levels of the dark pigment eumelanin.

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the woman with blond hair emoji features a friendly and approachable persona, rendered with soft, rounded edges and a warm, inviting color palette. Her hair cascades in smooth, gently highlighted waves, showcasing Apple's meticulous attention to detail in texture and lighting. The subtle smile and pleasant expression, characteristic of Apple's character designs, make this emoji a versatile choice for representing women with this hair color in various contexts, from personal messages to professional communications.
